body.p: Louisville, Kentucky, store clerk. Spencer County, Kentucky, native. Son of Emanuel Bamberger and Clara Bamberger. Lived in Louisville in 1850. Store clerk in Louisville in 1860.

bibl.p: Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Jefferson County, Louisville, District 3, p. 241; Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Jefferson County, Louisville, Ward 6, p. 33; Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Jefferson County, Louisville, Ward 5, p. 215; Passport Applications, 1795-1905, Roll 304, May 4, 1888, no. 17275, National Archives and Records Administration, Washington, D.C (accessed via Ancestry).
